arts.ttl: ‘Exceptional’ – Birmingham City player praised by Chris Davies after Stevenage win
arts.sum: Birmingham City boss Chris Davies has hailed Alfons Sampsted for his ‘exceptional’ attitude. Birmingham City’s defender has had… The post ‘Exceptional’ – Birmingham City player praised by Chris Davies after Stevenage win appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City ratings vs Stevenage as Sampsted stars and Paik ends goal wait
arts.sum: Kieran Dowell converted another penalty and Paik Seung-ho scored his first goal of the season in a 2-1 victory for Blues at St Andrew’s @ Knighthead Park. Alfons Sampsted, who was making his first league start for Blues, deserves credit for winning the penalty after combining neatly with Stansfield inside the box before being tugged back by Louis Thompson right in front of referee Alan Young.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies hails 'relentless' Birmingham City man who 'seized his chance'
arts.sum: Chris Davies hails 'relentless' Birmingham City man who'seized his chance' Chris Davies heaped praise on Alfons Sampsted after the right-back ‘seized his chance’ on his first league start for Birmingham City.

arts.ttl: Birmingham go 14 points clear at top with win over Stevenage
arts.sum: Kieran Dowell set Blues on their way with a penalty.

arts.ttl: Stevenage give it a go but Blues prove too tough a nut to crack
arts.sum: They came away with a 2-1 success at St Andrews, Kieran Dowell scoring the softest of soft penalties in the first half with Paik Seung-Ho added a second two minutes after the break. Stevenage: Cooper, Butler, Piergianni, Freeman, Kemp, Goode, Reid, Phillips, Thompson, King, Hanlan (Appere 74).

arts.ttl: Birmingham City handed fresh Wembley ticket update after plea to EFL
arts.sum: Birmingham City have been given an extra 6,490 tickets for their Vertu Trophy final against Peterborough United at Wembley next month. Birmingham City return to Wembley to face Peterborough United in the Vertu Trophy final on April 13

arts.ttl: Angry but at what or who? Player ratings for Stevenage v Mansfield Town in League One
arts.sum: Having a good ball player at right-back makes a difference. Unlucky with his shot off the post but seemed to be on a different wavelength with Hanlan at times, not great when he's trying to play off the front man.

arts.ttl: Manchester United are a year behind the Birmingham City timeframe even Tom Wagner thinks is ‘lunacy'
arts.sum: Birmingham City announced plans to build a new 60,000-seater stadium last year - now Man Utd are following suit According to Press Association, United hope the stadium can be built in five years, with sections to be constructed off site and transported along the Manchester Ship Canal.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney announcement made as former Birmingham City boss set for Man United return
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney is set to dust off his boots for Soccer Aid this summer, with the former England captain to play at Old Trafford once again Former Birmingham City manager Wayne Rooney is set to lace up his boots once again for Soccer Aid for UNICEF 2025.

arts.ttl: 3 attacking midfielders Birmingham City should eye this summer with loan duo departing
arts.sum: Birmingham City have recruited extensively this season so in the summer window, they shouldn’t actually have much work… The post 3 attacking midfielders Birmingham City should eye this summer with loan duo departing appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
